author: Novelty
title: Blue Rails
review: There's only so much that can be said about this set - it has blue rails and a blue cross piece.  These rais are compatible with the latter grey ones, but are not compatible with the current motorised and RC rails.

author: Wells
title: Semi-Compatible
review:
Yes, this is a simple set with just a cross piece and a number of straight rails, but it was quite useful for certain track layouts.

And I beg to differ on the incompatibility.... they are semi-compatible with later rail sets like the RC based ones. Yes, there is a bit of a gap between rails, but it is possible to link the older blue rails with the new generation of L-Scale rails.

author: tatuvlakia
title: Semi compatible. Opens up many layout possibilities
review:
Agreed on the semi-compatibility.

This set opens up many possibilities for creative layouts.

I used to have fun making trains crash or pass against each other when young!

There is a gap when crossing, but it is necessary to make the actual crossing possible.
